content.question: A block is attached to a spring and undergoes simple harmonic motion. The graph represents the position <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> as a function of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> of the block. Which of the following expressions correctly describes the block’s position <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> as a function of <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="x sub 0 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, the fraction 2 pi t over 3 t sub 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="x sub 0 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, 4 pi t over 3 t sub 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="2 x sub 0 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, the fraction 2 pi t over 3 t sub 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="2 x sub 0 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, 4 pi t over 3 t sub 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="x sub 0 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, the fraction 2 pi t over 3 t sub 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
